rules_text:
First strike
Whenever Takeda Taro deals combat damage to an opponent, it deals 1 damage to each creature and planeswalker that player controls.
flavor_text:
[i]“He slowly unwrapped the chains, letting his magic course through them. ‘Burn like my birthright,' he whispered, and burst into motion.”
—Azamir, “The Lost Prince”[/i]
